title: Define Project Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the DroneSiteInspector system. This includes user stories, use cases, technical specifications, regulatory requirements, stakeholder needs, and a prioritized list of features based on user feedback and industry standards. The aim is to create a comprehensive documentation that guides the development process.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the drone hardware, software components, communication protocols, and data storage solutions.

title: Develop Drone Control System
description: Implement the software for controlling the drone's flight, navigation, and sensor data collection.

title: Implement Data Processing Pipeline
description: Develop the backend system for processing and analyzing the collected sensor data, including 3D mapping, progress monitoring, and safety checks.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for monitoring and interacting with the DroneSiteInspector system.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the database schema and data management solutions for storing and retrieving sensor data, 3D models, and inspection reports.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the system's security by implementing authentication, authorization, and data encryption mechanisms.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the DroneSiteInspector system.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing of the DroneSiteInspector system, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.
dependencies: Set up Data Storage and Management

title: Prepare Documentation
description: Create user manuals, technical documentation, and training materials for the DroneSiteInspector system.
